text: what if I told you you could be a hero
save your best friend or your sister
brother cousin and what if I told you
you didn't need a superpower to do this
only your voice and courage if you see
someone with a gun leave immediately
until a grown up you trust sometimes
even our friends do things without
thinking and if they think it's cool to

hero save their life and others find a

when you're hanging out with a new

safe together
